Our services include tours, visa processing assistance, travel planning, accommodation, airport transfers, international money transfers, ticketing, VIP concierge &amp; charter services.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position:&nbsp;Accountant

JobLocation:&nbsp;Lagos&nbsp;

	Manage financial records, reconciliations, payments, and reporting to ensure accuracy, compliance, and financial control.

Accountant Job at AFARI Travels & Tours Limited




        
    

        
        AFARI Travels & Tours Limited - Sustainable Travel Approach with Transforming Experiences! We are a travels & tours packaging company that is committed to providing luxury-styled travel management, consultations and tourism. Our services include tours, visa processing assistance, travel planning, accommodation, airport transfers, international money transfers, ticketing, VIP concierge & charter services.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Accountant

JobLocation: Lagos 

Job Description
     

            
    




	Manage financial records, reconciliations, payments, and reporting to ensure accuracy, compliance, and financial control.
    

    

        Click here to Apply

Accountant Job at Dillon Consultant Nigeria Limited




        
    

        
        Dillon Consultant Nigeria Limited is an architectural consultant/real estate development company located in Lagos, Nigeria & The United States of America. Registered in February 1995. Dillon Consultant has as its primary focus - Property Development, Investment, Design Services and Facilities Management.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Accountant

Job Location: Nigeria

Requirements
     

            
    




	Candidates should possess relevant qualifications with experience.


Method of Application 
Interested and qualified candidates should send their Resume to: hr@dillonnigeria.com using the Job Posiiton as the subject of the email.

Note: For inquiries, contact: 09062449735.    

    

        Click here to Apply

Experienced Structural Engineer Job at Dillon Consultant Nigeria Limited

Dillon Consultant has as its primary focus - Property Development, Investment, Design Services and Facilities Management.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Location: Nigeria

Executive Assistant Job at AFARI Travels & Tours Limited




        
    

        
        AFARI Travels & Tours Limited - Sustainable Travel Approach with Transforming Experiences! We are a travels & tours packaging company that is committed to providing luxury-styled travel management, consultations and tourism. Our services include tours, visa processing assistance, travel planning, accommodation, airport transfers, international money transfers, ticketing, VIP concierge & charter services.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Executive Assistant

Job Location: Lagos 

Job Description
     

            
    




	Provide high-level administrative and operational support to leadership, ensuring smooth day-to-day execution and organisation.
    

    

        Click here to Apply

Content Developer (Media) Job at AFARI Travels & Tours Limited




        
    

        
        AFARI Travels & Tours Limited - Sustainable Travel Approach with Transforming Experiences! We are a travels & tours packaging company that is committed to providing luxury-styled travel management, consultations and tourism. Our services include tours, visa processing assistance, travel planning, accommodation, airport transfers, international money transfers, ticketing, VIP concierge & charter services.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Content Developer (Media)

Job Location: Lagos 

Job Description
     

            
    




	 Create and develop original video, written, and visual content that supports Afari’s marketing, campaigns, and brand storytelling across platforms.
    

    

        Click here to Apply
